nsisprocessHeaders: By default, only `.nsi` files will be compiled. This setting enables compilation for `.nsh` files as well.
nsisShowOutputView: Specify when to show compiler output in the output view
nsisExcludeFiles: Specify files that will be excluded from diagnostics. Supports [glob patterns](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch#matching-features).
nsisPreprocessMode: Linter runs in the much faster [pre-process mode](https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Docs/Chapter3.html#usagereference), but ignores warnings (unless in strict mode)
nsisStrictMode: Enabling strict mode will treat warnings as errors. Note that when disabled, running *NSIS: Compile Strict* will override the setting
nsisCustomArguments: Specify any of the default [compiler arguments](http://nsis.sourceforge.net/Docs/Chapter3.html#usage). Note that these will have precedence over the settings above
nsisPathToWine: Specifies a custom path to `wine`, e.g. with `wine32` or [`wine32on64`](https://github.com/Gcenx/homebrew-wine).
